Title: New York Minute
Writer: Emily Fox (story), Emily Fox (screenplay), Adam Cooper (screenplay), Bill Collage (screenplay)
Actors: Ashley Olsen, Mary-Kate Olsen, Eugene Levy, Andy Richter
Plot: Two very different twin sisters haven't spent a day together in years. That changes the day they have to go to NYC and everything goes wrong - chased by a truancy officer, a killer wanting a chip back and two nice young guys.
